T02D2327:268a-1: bhatt'a ra k'ar+ya t'a r'a s'a dh'a nam /
T02D2327:268a-3: rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs //
T02D2327:268a-4: smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2327:268a-5: ye shes dri med sgrol ma gsal ba'i thugs //
T02D2327:268a-6: smra bsam brjod med shes rab phar phyin gsungs //
T02D2327:268a-7: stong nyid snying rje'i rdo rje phag mo'i sku //
T02D2327:268a-8: rje btsun sgrol ma'i sku gsung thugs la 'dud //
T02D2327:268a-9: sgrol ma gsum dang tshul mthun rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2327:268a-10: rtag tu lha mo 'di bsgom bya phyir bshad //
T02D2327:268a-11: dang po rten gyi gang zag gis //
T02D2327:268a-12: gdong la sogs pa khrus byas nas //
T02D2327:268a-13: yid du 'ong ba'i gnas de ru //
T02D2327:268a-14: mandala byi dor legs byas la //
T02D2327:268a-15: bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni //
T02D2327:268a-16: snying gar zla dkyil yi ge t'am //
T02D2327:268a-18: bla ma lha mo spyan drangs la //
T02D2327:268a-19: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags //
T02D2327:268a-20: rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol //
T02D2327:268a-21: dge ba cung zad ci bsags pa //
T02D2327:268a-22: byang chub thob phyir bdag gis bsngo //
T02D2327:268a-23: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
T02D2327:268a-24: sngags 'di bzlas pas stong par bsgom //
T02D2327:268a-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D2327:268a-27: t'am las rje btsun sgrol ma ni //
T02D2327:268a-28: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang //
T02D2327:268a-29: g-yas na mchog sbyin phyag rgya can //
T02D2327:268a-31: rin chen rgyan rnams mdzes pa'i tshul //
T02D2327:268a-32: smra ba'i seng ges dbu brgyan pa //
T02D2327:268a-33: zhabs gnyis skyil krung phyed par bzhugs //
T02D2327:268a-34: dar gyi stod g-yogs smad g-yogs byas //
T02D2327:268a-35: de ltar dam tshig bskyed byas la //
T02D2327:268a-37: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la //
T02D2327:268a-38: dad pa'i stobs kyis phyag byas te //
T02D2327:268a-39: de nas mchod pa sngags 'dis dbul //
T02D2327:268a-40: aom badzra pushpe p'u dza h'um /
T02D2327:268a-41: aom badzra dh'u pe p'u dza h'um /
T02D2327:268a-42: aom badzra d'i pe p'u dza h'um /
T02D2327:268a-43: aom badzra gandhe p'u dza h'um /
T02D2327:268a-44: aom bardza nee bi dhye p'u dza h'um /
T02D2327:268a-45: aom g'i ti p'u dza h'um /
T02D2327:268a-46: ji srid mi skyo'i bar du bsgom //
T02D2327:268a-47: skyo na bzlas pa 'di ltar bya //
T02D2327:268b-0: @268b aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D2327:268b-1: sngags phreng snying ga nas phyung ste //
T02D2327:268b-2: ye shes thugs la mnyes pas mchod //
T02D2327:268b-5: bar chad sel dang sgrib sbyangs bsam //
T02D2327:268b-6: des skyo gtor ma gtang bya ste //
T02D2327:268b-7: mi rtog aom las rin chen snod //
T02D2327:268b-8: a'a:las bdud rtsi sna tshogs bsam //
T02D2327:268b-9: h'um las thim zhing sna tshogs gsol //
T02D2327:268b-10: sngags 'dir snying po btags te dbul //
T02D2327:268b-11: ba lim ta p'u dza aargham p'u dza ba lim
T02D2327:268b-12: ai dam grihna kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi aargham
T02D2327:268b-13: pra t'i tstsha p'u dza kh'a hi sv'a h'a /
T02D2327:268b-14: dad pa'i stobs kyis bstod par bya //
T02D2327:268b-15: aom stong nyid snying rje phag mo che //
T02D2327:268b-16: sgrol ma'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-17: smra bsam brjod med pha rol phyin //
T02D2327:268b-18: sgrol ma'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-19: dri med ye shes gsal ba'i thugs //
T02D2327:268b-20: sgrol ma'i thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-21: zla 'od srid pa'i mun sel ba //
T02D2327:268b-22: 'joms byed nyi ma'i dkyil dang mtshungs //
T02D2327:268b-23: thabs dang shes rab yon tan ldan //
T02D2327:268b-24: sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud //
T02D2327:268b-26: srid gsum rnam thar gsum la 'god //
T02D2327:268b-27: seng ldeng nags la rab gnas shing //
T02D2327:268b-28: 'jigs pa brgyad las shin tu skyob //
T02D2327:268b-29: sgro lams la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-30: mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams su //
T02D2327:268b-31: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing //
T02D2327:268b-32: skye shi med pa'i chos kyang ston //
T02D2327:268b-33: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-34: dpal dang ldan pa'i zhing khams su //
T02D2327:268b-35: rin chen mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing //
T02D2327:268b-36: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad rnams sel //
T02D2327:268b-37: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-38: bde ba can gyi zhing khams na //
T02D2327:268b-40: bde ba chen po'i ngang la gnas //
T02D2327:268b-41: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-42: rnam par dag pa'i zhing khams na //
T02D2327:268b-43: las kyi mkha' 'gro'i skur ston cing //
T02D2327:268b-44: phrin las bzhi yi don yang sgrub //
T02D2327:268b-45: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:268b-46: mtha' dbus med pa'i zhing khams na //
T02D2327:268b-47: pha rol phyin ma'i skur ston cing //
T02D2327:268b-48: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshogs dang bcas //
T02D2327:268b-49: sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2327:269a-2: stong pa nyid kyi ngang la nyal //
T02D2327:269a-3: las dang spyod lam ci spyod pa //
T02D2327:269a-4: lha mo'i nga rgyal du ni bsgom //
T02D2327:269a-5: 'di brtsams pa yi dge ba gang //
T02D2327:269a-6: rje btsun sgrol ma'i thugs rje dang //
T02D2327:269a-7: dam pa rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis //
T02D2327:269a-8: rje btsun sgrol ma 'grub par shog btsun ka ma
